page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SAM
page.content: I woke up at 7 o'clock and had some Weetabix for breakfast.Then I went outside and played on my bike.After a while I put my bike away and played on my computer instead.First I loaded 'Jetpac' and I played on it for about half-an-hour.After that I loaded Manic Miner,I played on that until lunch time.For lunch we had Spagetti Bolonesa.When I had finished my lunch,I went to Christians and we played on our bikes at the playing fields.I went home and had oxtail soup for tea.After tea I watched Buck Rogers, then I played on our computer until bed time.
